reference-code.description: Yes, the Incident was Weapon-Related and one non-firearm weapon was possessed/used.
Yes, the Incident was Weapon-Related and two or more were used and none were firearms*.
Yes, the Incident was Weapon-Related and at least one was a firearm*.
Yes, the Incident was Weapon-Related and two or more were firearms*.
No, the Incident was not Weapon-Related.
Use this code for (UBL) Unsubstantiated Bullying and (UHR) Unsubstantiated Harassment.
